det.label: VIOLENCE_GRAPHIC
det.rsn: Graphic depiction of gore, blood, and dismemberment.
det.adv: Consider removing or significantly reducing graphic details to comply with policy.

det.label: MURDER_HOMICIDE
det.rsn: Explicit depiction of a murder act with gore.
det.adv: Consider removing or altering the scene to avoid explicit instructions or portrayal of homicide.
